TITLE: STEPS
One Bowl Chocolate Cake: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.
column3: Stir sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl.
column4: Add eggs, milk, oil and vanilla; mix for 2 minutes on medium speed with an electric mixer.
column5: Stir in the boiling water. The batter will be thin.
column6: Pour evenly into the prepared pans.
column7: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 to 35 minutes. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
